sourceDesc.p: From the Marion B. Gebbie Archives and Special Collections at the Madeleine Clark Wallace Library, Wheaton College

row.cell: To rent of cottage from date at $
To the Loan of 2 Meat Tubs
To cash to pay Daughters tuition
To cash paid Slibbins for batter
To writ vs E. Lane as pr unit Book
To 3 lbs. Green Paint 35x pr lb
To e + T. Tax on House 1/2 $3 00.
To e + T. Tax on House
To 15 1/2 lbs of Pork .7x pr lb
To 3 Buss. Blk. & 2 Buss. Red Potatoes 25x
